item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: As often happens with twitter, I only saw the Lily side of the war since I don't follow Perez and couldn't be arsed to view his twitter page to find out what the hell was going on. It was a bit odd. Glad it is over. She's on Ellen today, I think.
item.content:encoded: As often happens with twitter, I only saw the Lily side of the war since I don’t follow Perez and couldn’t be arsed to view his twitter page to find out what the hell was going on. It was a bit odd. Glad it is over. She’s on Ellen today, I think.
